title: Create a Purchase Order for a Supplier
description: A procurement manager needs to create a new purchase order to replenish stock for a popular product.

tasks.description: Identify that a product's inventory has fallen below the reorder threshold.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives an alert that stock for a specific item is low.

tasks.description: Create a new purchase order for the product from the primary supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new PO in the system.

tasks.description: Send the purchase order to the supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent emails the PO to the supplier's sales contact.
